metadata.title: CVE-2024-10458 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A permission leak could have occurred from a trusted site to an untrustedsite via `embed` or `object` elements. This vulnerability affects Firefox <132, Firefox ESR < 128.4, Firefox ESR < 115.17, Thunderbird < 128.4, andThunderbird < 132.

criterions.comment: mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
